findings.title: Lack of validation of signed dealing against original dealing
findings.description: The `EcdsaPreSignerImpl::validate_dealing_support` method does not check that the content of signed dealings matches the original dealings, allowing a malicious receiver to change the requested height or internal data before signing.

findings.title: The ECDSA payload is not updated if a quadruple fails to complete
findings.description: If a transcript fails to complete, the corresponding quadruple will also fail to complete and its ID will remain in the `quadruples_in_creation` set until the key is reshared and the set is purged.

findings.title: Malicious canisters can exhaust the number of available quadruples
findings.description: By requesting a large number of signatures, a canister (or set of canisters) could exhaust the number of available quadruples, preventing other signature requests from completing

findings.title: Aggregated signatures are dropped if their request IDs are not recognized
findings.description: The `update_signature_agreements` function aggregates completed signatures from the ECDSA pool but drops the signature if its associated signing request ID is not in the set of ongoing signatures.
